para.sentence: Here \delta denotes an arbitrary small positive constant and \zeta=\tfrac{2}{3}z^{\ifrac{3}{2}}.
Lastly, for x>0 we define \chi(x)={\pi^{\ifrac{1}{2}}}\Gamma\left(\tfrac{1}{2}x+1\right)/\Gamma\left( \tfrac{1}{2}x+\tfrac{1}{2}\right).
For large x , \chi(x)\sim(\tfrac{1}{2}\pi x)^{\ifrac{1}{2}}.
Numerical values of \chi(n) are given in Table 9.7.1 for n=1(1)20 to 2D.
As z\to\infty the following asymptotic expansions are valid uniformly in the stated sectors.

\mathrm{Ai}\left(z\right)\sim\frac{e^{-\zeta}}{2\sqrt{\pi}z^{1/4}}\sum_{k=0}^{ \infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{u_{k}}{\zeta^{k}}, if |\operatorname{ph}z|\leq\pi-\delta, , \mathrm{Ai}'\left(z\right)\sim-\frac{z^{1/4}e^{-\zeta}}{2\sqrt{\pi}}\sum_{k=0} ^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{v_{k}}{\zeta^{k}}, if |\operatorname{ph}z|\leq\pi-\delta, \mathrm{Bi}\left(z\right)\sim\frac{e^{\zeta}}{\sqrt{\pi}z^{1/4}}\sum_{k=0}^{ \infty}\frac{u_{k}}{\zeta^{k}}, if |\operatorname{ph}z|\leq\tfrac{1}{3}\pi-\delta, , \mathrm{Bi}'\left(z\right)\sim\frac{z^{1/4}e^{\zeta}}{\sqrt{\pi}}\sum_{k=0}^{ \infty}\frac{v_{k}}{\zeta^{k}}, if |\operatorname{ph}z|\leq\tfrac{1}{3}\pi-\delta.

\mathrm{Ai}\left(-z\right)\sim\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi}z^{1/4}}\left(\cos\left(\zeta -\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{u_{2k}}{\zeta^{2k}}+ \sin\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{u_{2k+1 }}{\zeta^{2k+1}}\right), if |\operatorname{ph}z|\leq\tfrac{2}{3}\pi-\delta, , \mathrm{Ai}'\left(-z\right)\sim\frac{z^{1/4}}{\sqrt{\pi}}\left(\sin\left(\zeta -\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{v_{2k}}{\zeta^{2k}}- \cos\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{v_{2k+1 }}{\zeta^{2k+1}}\right), if |\operatorname{ph}z|\leq\tfrac{2}{3}\pi-\delta, \mathrm{Bi}\left(-z\right)\sim\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi}z^{1/4}}\left(-\sin\left( \zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{u_{2k}}{\zeta^{2k }}+\cos\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{u_{2 k+1}}{\zeta^{2k+1}}\right), if |\operatorname{ph}z|\leq\tfrac{2}{3}\pi-\delta, , \mathrm{Bi}'\left(-z\right)\sim\frac{z^{1/4}}{\sqrt{\pi}}\left(\cos\left(\zeta -\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{v_{2k}}{\zeta^{2k}}+ \sin\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{v_{2k+1 }}{\zeta^{2k+1}}\right), if |\operatorname{ph}z|\leq\tfrac{2}{3}\pi-\delta.

\mathrm{Bi}\left(ze^{\pm\pi i/3}\right)\mathrel{\sim}\sqrt{\frac{2}{\pi}}\frac {e^{\pm\pi i/6}}{z^{1/4}}\*\left(\cos\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\mp\tfrac{1}{2 }\mathrm{i}\ln 2\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{u_{2k}}{\zeta^{2k}}+ \sin\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\mp\tfrac{1}{2}\mathrm{i}\ln 2\right)\sum_{k=0} ^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{u_{2k+1}}{\zeta^{2k+1}}\right), if |\operatorname{ph}z|\leq\tfrac{2}{3}\pi-\delta, \mathrm{Bi}'\left(ze^{\pm\pi i/3}\right)\mathrel{\sim}\sqrt{\frac{2}{\pi}}e^{ \mp\pi i/6}z^{1/4}\*\left(-\sin\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\mp\tfrac{1}{2} \mathrm{i}\ln 2\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{v_{2k}}{\zeta^{2k}}+ \cos\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\mp\tfrac{1}{2}\mathrm{i}\ln 2\right)\sum_{k=0} ^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{v_{2k+1}}{\zeta^{2k+1}}\right), if |\operatorname{ph}z|\leq\tfrac{2}{3}\pi-\delta.

In (9.7.5) and (9.7.6) the n th error term, that is, the error on truncating the expansion at n terms, is bounded in magnitude by the first neglected term and has the same sign, provided that the following term is of opposite sign, that is, if n\geq 0 for (9.7.5) and n\geq 1 for (9.7.6).

In (9.7.7) and (9.7.8) the n th error term is bounded in magnitude by the first neglected term multiplied by \chi(n+\sigma)+1 where \sigma=\frac{1}{6} for (9.7.7) and \sigma=0 for (9.7.8), provided that n\geq 0 in the first case and n\geq 1 in the second case.

In (9.7.9)–(9.7.12) the n th error term in each infinite series is bounded in magnitude by the first neglected term and has the same sign, provided that the following term in the series is of opposite sign.

As special cases, when 0<x<\infty \mathrm{Ai}\left(x\right)\leq\frac{e^{-\xi}}{2\sqrt{\pi}x^{1/4}}, ,|\mathrm{Ai}'\left(x\right)|\leq\frac{x^{1/4}e^{-\xi}}{2\sqrt{\pi}}\left(1+ \frac{7}{72\xi}\right), , \mathrm{Bi}\left(x\right)\leq\frac{{\mathrm{e}^{\xi}}}{\sqrt{\pi}x^{1/4}}\left (1+\left(\chi(\tfrac{7}{6})+1\right)\frac{5}{72\xi}\right),\mathrm{Bi}'\left(x\right)\leq\frac{x^{1/4}e^{\xi}}{\sqrt{\pi}}\left(1+\left( \frac{\pi}{2}+1\right)\frac{7}{72\xi}\right), where \xi=\tfrac{2}{3}x^{3/2}.

The n th error term in ( 9.7.5) and (9.7.6) is bounded in magnitude by the first neglected term multiplied by \begin{cases}1,&|\operatorname{ph}z|\leq\tfrac{1}{3}\pi,\\ \min\left(|\csc\left(\operatorname{ph}\zeta\right)|,\chi(n+\sigma)+1\right),& \tfrac{1}{3}\pi\leq|\operatorname{ph}z|\leq\tfrac{2}{3}\pi,\\ \frac{\sqrt{2\pi(n+\sigma)}}{|\cos\left(\operatorname{ph}\zeta\right)|^{n+ \sigma}}+\chi(n+\sigma)+1,&\tfrac{2}{3}\pi\leq|\operatorname{ph}z|<\pi,\end{cases} provided that n\geq 0 , \sigma=\tfrac{1}{6} for ( 9.7.5) and n\geq 1 , \sigma=0 for (9.7.6).
Corresponding bounds for the errors in (9.7.7) to (9.7.14) may be obtained by use of these results and those of §9.2(v) and their differentiated forms.

In (9.7.5) and (9.7.6) let \mathrm{Ai}\left(z\right)=\frac{e^{-\zeta}}{2\sqrt{\pi}z^{1/4}}\left(\sum_{k=0 }^{n-1}(-1)^{k}\frac{u_{k}}{\zeta^{k}}+R_{n}(z)\right), , \mathrm{Ai}'\left(z\right)=-\frac{z^{1/4}e^{-\zeta}}{2\sqrt{\pi}}\left(\sum_{k =0}^{n-1}(-1)^{k}\frac{v_{k}}{\zeta^{k}}+S_{n}(z)\right), with n=\left\lfloor 2|\zeta|\right\rfloor.

Then R_{n}(z)=(-1)^{n}\sum_{k=0}^{m-1}(-1)^{k}u_{k}\frac{G_{n-k}\left(2\zeta\right) }{\zeta^{k}}+R_{m,n}(z), , S_{n}(z)=(-1)^{n-1}\sum_{k=0}^{m-1}(-1)^{k}v_{k}\frac{G_{n-k}\left(2\zeta \right)}{\zeta^{k}}+S_{m,n}(z), where G_{p}\left(z\right)=\frac{e^{z}}{2\pi}\Gamma\left(p\right)\Gamma\left(1-p,z \right).
(For the notation see §8.2(i).)And as z\rightarrow\infty with m fixed R_{m,n}(z),S_{m,n}(z)=O\left(e^{-2|\zeta|}\zeta^{-m}\right), if |\operatorname{ph}z|\leq\tfrac{2}{3}\pi.
For re-expansions of the remainder terms in (9.7.7)–(9.7.14) combine the results of this section with those of §9.2(v) and their differentiated forms, as in §9.7(iv).
For higher re-expansions of the remainder terms seeOlde Daalhuis (1995, 1996), and Olde Daalhuis and Olver (1995a).
